title: Debt Ceiling, ICE & Libra
itunes:title: Debt Ceiling, ICE & Libra
description:
Kevin spoke with Eli Yokley, Political reporter for Morning Consult, and Justin Sink, Bloomberg News White House reporter. They discussed President Donald Trump's comments earlier today, ICE, the debt ceiling, and Facebook's digital currency Libra.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
